interactive_media.name: Interactive media
interactive_media.description: You create prototypes of interactive media products for your client by using iterations, user research and examples from the professional field.

development.name: Development
development.description: You program and integrate proofs of concepts based on validated requirements and documented with version control tools.

design.name: Design
design.description: You craft quality visual designs with a professional toolset

research.name: Research
research.description: You apply exploratory research methods, driven by a curious and critical attitude.

communication.name: Communication
communication.description: You communicate effectively with your stakeholders (text and visuals) about the progress of your project and the motivation of your choices.

professional_identity.name: Professional identity
professional_identity.description: You present your professional identity as a media designer in a portfolio that shows your growth and choices.
